description: This file defines a React functional component 'AuthGate' which acts as an access control wrapper in the frontend. It manages rendering children components based on user authentication status and loading state, utilizing context provided by 'useAuth'.

methods.name: AuthGate({ requireAuth = false, fallback = null, children })
methods.description: React functional component that controls access to its children based on authentication state and loading status.

ctags.name: AuthGate
ctags.pattern: /^export default function AuthGate({ requireAuth = false, fallback = null, children }) {$/
